Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Ashley's life prior to or as the outbreak began. It is possible she once had a career as a teacher.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point following the outbreak, Ashley joined the Alexandria Safe Zone , where she began working as a teacher for the community's children. Ashley is teaching her lessons to Lydia , Gracie , and several other Alexandrian children when the council announces they need to cut class short as they need the space to hold an emergency meeting regarding the discovery of a Whisperer mask in Oceanside . Following Beta 's attack on Alexandria that left several Alexandrians dead, Ashley has not been seen or mentioned since, leaving her fate unknown.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows all the victims Ashley has killed: Possibly numerous counts of zombies
Relationships[]: Alexandria Safe Zone Lydia - Student Gracie - Student
Trivia[]: This character is credited as Teacher in " Lines We Cross ". This character's name was revealed by the actress as having originated from Greg Nicotero , the director of the episode. [1]
